inclusion.criterion: Women with known type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adherence to her diabetes care regimen and glycemic control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Initial diabetes education and started on an individualized diabetic diet regimen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) level is obtained every one to three months during pregnancy as well as near the time of delivery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Reminders based on their individual disease treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Text message reminders for glucose and food records to appointments
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Postpartum patients who had GDM will receive a text message reminder to complete their glucose tolerance test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women with T2DM will be reminded to bring glucose and food records to their postpartum visits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients in the contact control group will be enrolled in the text4baby program with assistance from a healthcare provider
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hospitalizations Patient hospitalization for diabetic control shall be recorded for data collection
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Delivery details will be abstracted from patient charts and shall include gestational age at delivery, fetal weight, vaginal versus cesarean delivery, incidence of shoulder dystocia, APGAR scores, and umbilical cord blood gases
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Maternal Complications Incidence of postpartum wound infections or dehiscence shall be collected
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Postpartum The postpartum glucose tolerance tests of women who had GDM will be reviewed to determine her glucose tolerance status
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The patient does not have a cellular phone
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The fetus has a chromosomal or non-chromosomal malformation
exclusion.label: triggers
